meanings.definition: Most suitable for traveling on the sea.
meanings.sent1: The sturdy ship was considered the seaworthiest vessel in the entire fleet.
meanings.sent2: The captain chose the seaworthiest boat for the long voyage across the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The seaworthiest raft in the race ended up winning by a large margin.
meanings.sent4: Her skills in navigation made her the seaworthiest sailor among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The seaworthiest lifeboat saved all the passengers during the storm.

meanings.definition: Having the necessary qualities for safe travel on the sea.
meanings.sent1: The seaworthiest boats are equipped with life-saving devices.
meanings.sent2: Only the seaworthiest vessels are allowed to set sail during rough weather.
meanings.sent3: The seaworthiest ship in the harbor had a crew of experienced sailors.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of the sea made him the seaworthiest captain in the region.
meanings.sent5: The seaworthiest lighthouse guided ships safely to shore during the night.
